Mewdeko Docs

Class PermissionService

Manages permissions for commands and interactions within the guilds, allowing dynamic updates and checks.

Inheritance
object
PermissionService
Implements
ILateBlocker

Type Name Description

The database service for accessing permission settings.

The service for localized bot strings.

The service for managing guild-specific settings.
